publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2101 Mike Pringle: A Climate of Fear—That the Parliament expresses concern regarding the growing climate of fear in the United Kingdom; notes the inflammatory nature of the media report, "Alert after ‘Arabs’ take photographs of Holyrood"; further notes the detrimental impact that such a climate of fear may have on the Scottish tourist industry, and believes that, while the issue of security is imperative, this must be balanced with respect for civil liberties.
S2M-2101 A Climate of Fear (lodged on 2 December 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mike Rumbles*
S2M-2101 A Climate of Fear (lodged on 2 December 2004) Chris Ballance*, Robert Brown*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2101 A Climate of Fear (lodged on 2 December 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Smith*
S2M-2101 A Climate of Fear (lodged on 2 December 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-2101 A Climate of Fear (lodged on 2 December 2004) Eleanor Scott* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
